logic.simulator
Class PossibleHandsCreator

java.lang.Object
  logic.simulator.PossibleHandsCreator

public class PossibleHandsCreator
extends java.lang.Object

Creates all possible hands by combining cards from the starting hand with the board cards. Here both the board and the starting hand must be full.

Field Summary
private  FiveCardBoard board
           
private  AbstractStartingHand startingHand

PossibleHandsCreator(AbstractStartingHand startingHand)
          Creates a new PossibleHandCreator without a board.
PossibleHandsCreator(AbstractStartingHand startingHand, FiveCardBoard board)
          Creates a new PossibleHandCreator.
 
Method Summary
 java.util.List<FiveCardPokerHand> createAllPossibleHands()
          Creates all the possible five card poker hands with the given starting hand and board.

startingHand

private AbstractStartingHand startingHand

board

private FiveCardBoard board
Constructor Detail

PossibleHandsCreator

public PossibleHandsCreator(AbstractStartingHand startingHand,
                            FiveCardBoard board)
Creates a new PossibleHandCreator. This constructor is to be used when creating possible hands for community card games.

Parameters:
startingHand - Starting hand
board - Board
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if startingHand or board is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if startingHand or board isn't full.

PossibleHandsCreator

public PossibleHandsCreator(AbstractStartingHand startingHand)
Creates a new PossibleHandCreator without a board. This constructor should be used when creating possible hands for non-community card games.

Parameters:
startingHand - Starting hand
Method Detail

createAllPossibleHands

public java.util.List<FiveCardPokerHand> createAllPossibleHands()
Creates all the possible five card poker hands with the given starting hand and board.

Returns:
List of five card poker hands.
